required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Sequential Low-dose Decitabine With PD-1/CD28 CD19 CAR-T in Relapsed or Refractory B-cell Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: Sequential Low-dose Decitabine Therapy With Novel CAR-T Carrying PD-1/CD28 Chimeric Switch Receptor in Relapsed or Refractory B-cell Lymphoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

clinical_study.source: Second Affiliated Hospital, School of Medicine, Zhejiang University

brief_summary.textblock: To evaluate the efficacy and safety of CD19 PD-1/CD28-CAR-T sequential low-dose decitabine in the treatment of relapse or refractory B cell lymphoma.

primary_outcome.description: Objective response rate of the combination

arm_group.arm_group_label: CD19 PD-1/CD28 CAR-T Plus Low Dose Decitabine

intervention.intervention_name: CD19 PD-1/CD28 CAR-T Plus Low Dose Decitabine
intervention.description: CD19 PD-1/CD28 CAR-T Plus Low Dose Decitabine
